statements: UPDATE inventory_levels SET current_stock = 20, optimal_stock = 30 WHERE product_id = 101;
UPDATE inventory_levels SET product_name = 'New Product Name', current_stock = 50 WHERE category = 'electronics';

UPDATE inventory_levels SET optimal_stock = 200, current_stock = 120, category = 'Electronics' WHERE product_id = 2;

UPDATE sustainable_products SET product_name = 'Eco-Friendly Paper Cups' WHERE product_id = 1;
UPDATE suppliers SET contact_name = 'John Doe', contact_email = 'johndoe@example.com' WHERE supplier_id = 3;
UPDATE sustainable_products SET inventory_level = inventory_level - 10 WHERE product_id = 101;

UPDATE products SET unit_price = 25.50, stock_quantity = 100 WHERE product_id = 1;

UPDATE products SET unit_price = 15.99, stock_quantity = 100 WHERE product_id = 1;
UPDATE inventory SET current_stock_quantity = 150, last_updated = NOW() WHERE product_id = 2;
UPDATE FoodProducts SET price = 15.99, quantity = 100 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Suppliers SET contact_number = '+1-800-123-4567', email = 'supplier@example.com' WHERE supplier_id = 2;
UPDATE FoodProducts SET price = price * 1.1, quantity = quantity - 1 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Inventory SET quantity = quantity + 10, last_restock_date = '2022-03-15' WHERE inventory_id = 5;
